summary: Tested new features: 1) WooCommerce merchandise integration - API returning 8 products with images/prices/Buy Now buttons. 2) Promo videos API returning 10 seeded videos (day-specific + common). 3) /merch page displays products correctly. 4) Homepage has F&F Merch Shop button navigating to /merch. 5) Admin Videos tab shows all 10 promo videos with CRUD controls.

issues: Video shows loading spinner on Wednesday - video is loading but takes time

critical_code_review_comments: WooCommerce integration uses proper API keys from .env - NOT mocked
Promo videos correctly organized by day_of_week with is_common flag
Merchandise page fetches products via /api/merchandise endpoint
DailyVideoCarousel fetches from /api/promo-videos and falls back to hardcoded URLs
Admin Videos tab shows 10 videos with edit/delete/toggle-visibility controls
seed_data_creation: Promo videos seeded via /api/admin/promo-videos/seed endpoint (9 initial + 1 test video)
context_for_next_testing_agent: WooCommerce integration is LIVE (not mocked) using finandfeathersrestaurants.com store. Products include t-shirts, hats, etc. Promo videos are seeded for each day of week plus 'common' videos that show on all days.

mocked_apis.note: WooCommerce API is real - fetches live products from finandfeathersrestaurants.com

GET /api/merchandise returns products fr.details: Returns 8 products with id, name, price, image, permalink, categories

/merch page displays products with image.details: 8 product cards displayed with prices ($19.25), descriptions, Buy Now buttons, category filters

Homepage has F&F Merch Shop button that.details: Purple gradient button with shopping bag icon, navigates correctly to /merch

Admin Videos tab shows promo videos with.details: Shows 10 videos with title, URL, day badge, edit/delete/visibility controls, Add Video button

Video carousel fetches from API.details: DailyVideoCarousel component fetches from /api/promo-videos, has day selector buttons

Admin promo video CRUD operations.details: Tested create/read/update/delete flow - all operations work correctly
